EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Trade's Insane Black Friday Special
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s here!
GoDirect Trade is getting into the holiday spirit and going BIG on Black Friday.
The first 25 users can snag a FREE ONE-YEAR SUBSCRIPTION using promo code BLACKFRIDAY. You read that right, a FREE one-year subscription on GoDirect Trade which includes:
- Customized storefront that can be configured and launched in three easy steps. - Unlimited listings in your ecommerce store. - Zero transaction fees. - White glove customer support to ensure your store launches flawlessly.
This is one doorbuster you won’t want to miss. Launch your storefront today and see why Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidpetersson/2019/01/07/what-honeywells-ecommerce-platform-means-for-blockchain-in-aviation]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Yahoo! Finance <[[https://finance.yahoo.com/news/honeywells-trading-business-uses-blockchain-140000375.html]]> are all talking about our marketplace. ACCESS THE GDT BLACK FRIDAY PROMO <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?param=launch_promotion&utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Seller_Subscription_Promo]]> Best regards,
Lisa Butters Honeywell Aerospace GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Seller_Subscription_Promo]]>
